#  Ink&dollar;
<!--
@name:  Ink&dollar;
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

 Returns a string to use in Text and Format Text instructions to change the color of the ink
## Parameters

- **color**: The index of the color in the palette for paletted screens, or the RGB value if not paletted
---
